data.actual_result: no red action buttons appear. if the server mute permission is granted, all 3 of the buttons appear.  conversely, if a user has server mute permissions, but not move or deafen perms, all 3 buttons will appear anyway.
data.expected_result: the 'move user' and 'server deafen' buttons should appear in red.
data.short_description: server deafen and move user buttons are tied to the server mute permission
data.steps_to_repro: - be on a server where you have move user and server deafen permissions - long press on a user in a voice chat - observe the user menu that appears
